/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A few trees are scattered throughout the scene, adding a touch of green to the concrete jungle. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, contributing to the dynamic energy of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
